channel.title: CVE Feed for Open WebUI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open WebUI -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6706|2024-08-08T13:18:06.511Z -- open%20webui -- open%20webui
item.description: Attackers can craft a malicious prompt that coerces the language model into executing arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the web page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6707|2024-08-08T13:16:33.432Z -- open%20webui -- open%20webui
item.description: Attacker controlled files can be uploaded to arbitrary locations on the web server's filesystem by abusing a path traversal vulnerability.

item.description: Attackers can craft a malicious prompt that coerces the language model into executing arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the web page.

item.description: Attacker controlled files can be uploaded to arbitrary locations on the web server's filesystem by abusing a path traversal vulnerability.
